compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.0+ allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, especially with dynamic linking. Static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Ensure that recipients receive the same rights you received.
Make sure to include the license and copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the library.
If the library is modified, inform recipients that it is not the original version.
license.name: LGPL-2.0+
obligations: Distribute copies of the library with the same rights granted to you.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the library.
Provide complete object files to allow relinking with modified versions of the library.
Include a copy of the LGPL license with any distributed copies.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
